name: Awesome Tool Tip
author: Md. Shiddikur Rahman

sections.description:
This is an awesome free Tool Tip WordPress Plugin.

Just use This Shortcode [tool_tip tooltip_style=”” link_text=”” tooltip_content=””]

If You Tool Tip Left saw then use it [tool_tip tooltip_style=”turnleft” link_text=”” tooltip_content=””]

If You Tool Tip Right saw then use it [tool_tip tooltip_style=”turnright” link_text=”” tooltip_content=””]

Plugin demo link http://webeeoo.com/wp_plugin/tool-tip/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate it through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Enable plugin
